products.name: Vanilla
products.longDescription: Indulge in our classic vanilla ice cream, made with premium vanilla beans and fresh cream. The smooth texture and rich vanilla flavor make it a timeless favorite for ice cream lovers everywhere.

products.name: Chocolate
products.longDescription: Experience the richness of our premium chocolate ice cream, crafted with Belgian cocoa. Every spoonful delivers a deep, satisfying chocolate flavor that's perfect for chocolate enthusiasts.

products.name: Strawberry
products.longDescription: Made with real strawberries, our strawberry ice cream is a burst of fruity freshness. We use only the finest strawberries to ensure a natural, delicious taste in every bite.

products.name: Butterscotch
products.longDescription: Our butterscotch ice cream combines the sweetness of caramel with rich buttery notes. The indulgent flavor profile makes it a perfect dessert choice.

products.name: Mango
products.longDescription: Transport yourself to tropical paradise with our mango ice cream. Made from ripe, juicy mangoes, this flavor captures the essence of summer in every scoop.

products.name: Coconut
products.longDescription: Escape to a tropical island with our creamy coconut ice cream. We blend fresh coconut milk with cream to create a luxuriously smooth and authentic coconut experience.

products.name: Guava
products.longDescription: Our guava ice cream offers a unique blend of sweet and tangy flavors. Perfect for those who love tropical fruits and adventurous taste buds.

products.name: Lychee
products.longDescription: Discover the delicate and floral notes of our lychee ice cream. This exotic flavor is a favorite among those seeking something truly special.

products.name: Dark Chocolate
products.longDescription: For the dark chocolate connoisseur, our dark chocolate ice cream delivers intense cocoa flavor with a sophisticated, slightly bitter finish.

products.name: Belgium Chocolate
products.longDescription: Indulge in our premium Belgium chocolate ice cream, crafted with imported Belgian chocolate. The smooth, velvety texture and rich chocolate flavor are unmatched.

products.name: Brownie Fudge
products.longDescription: Enjoy creamy chocolate ice cream loaded with chunks of fudgy brownies. A chocolate lover's dream combination with perfect texture contrast.

products.name: Nutella
products.longDescription: Our Nutella ice cream captures the beloved hazelnut-chocolate flavor you know and love. Smooth, creamy, and absolutely delicious.
